sentences.sContent: Here again, of course, you can always try some practice tests to familiarise yourself with the format.
sentences.sContent_eng: Here again, of course, you can always try some practice tests to familiarise yourself with the format.
sentences.sCn: 当然,为了熟悉考试形式你也可以做一些测试练习。

sentences.sContent: I began to familiarise myself with my new body: the grill, the bread bin, the speaker and the spring mechanism.
sentences.sContent_eng: I began to familiarise myself with my new body: the grill, the bread bin, the speaker and the spring mechanism.
sentences.sCn: 我开始熟悉自己的新身体：烤盘、面包箱、话筒和弹簧装置。

sentences.sContent: The reason you want to familiarise yourself with the camera is that when you read the manual and it refers to a button with a star and moon you will know where it is.
sentences.sContent_eng: The reason you want to familiarise yourself with the camera is that when you read the manual and it refers to a button with a star and moon you will know where it is.
sentences.sCn: 要熟悉相机的理由是，当你阅读说明书时，对上面提到的按键你都知道在哪里。
